intro: Jasione foliosa, commonly known as the leafy jasione, is a flowering plant native to southern Europe and western Asia. It belongs to the family Caryophyllaceae, which includes many flowering plants with showy flowers. The plant typically grows in grassy areas and along rocky slopes, preferring well-drained soils. Its flowers are small and pinkish-white, often appearing in clusters at the tips of the stems. Jasione foliosa is known for its ornamental value and is sometimes cultivated in gardens for its delicate appearance.
